description: Police said local authorities will remove it in due course.
title: Static caravan blocks Fen road
title_page: Cambridgeshire : Static caravan blocks Fen road  - BBC News
maintext:
A static caravan has blocked a Fenland road in both directions.
Cambridgeshire police said the area around Leverington Common between Popple Drove and High Side near Wisbech, Cambridgeshire is shut in both directions.
Motorists have been advised to avoid the area.
Police said the large white caravan is expected to be removed by local authorities in due course.
